Class BookingService

java.lang.Object
com.inFlight.server.service.BookingService
public class BookingService extends Object
BookingService is a service class that handles booking-related operations. It interacts with the BookingDAO, SpacewalkSlotDAO, and PassengerDAO to manage bookings.

  • Method Details

    • processBooking

      public com.google.gson.JsonObject processBooking(int passengerId, int slotId, int tier)
      Processes a booking for a passenger.
      Parameters:
      passengerId - the ID of the passenger
      slotId - the ID of the slot
      tier - the tier of the booking
      Returns:
      a JsonObject containing the status and new balance

    • getBookingsForPassenger

      public List<Booking> getBookingsForPassenger(int passengerId)
      Retrieves all bookings made by a specific passenger.
      Parameters:
      passengerId - the ID of the passenger
      Returns:
      a list of Booking objects made by the specified passenger

    • getBookingsByStatus

      public List<Booking> getBookingsByStatus(String status)
      Retrieves all bookings with a specific status.
      Parameters:
      status - the status of the bookings to retrieve
      Returns:
      a list of Booking objects with the specified status

    • approveBooking

      public void approveBooking(int bookingId)
      Approves a booking by updating its status to "approved".
      Parameters:
      bookingId - the ID of the booking to approve

    • denyBooking

      public void denyBooking(int bookingId)
      Denies a booking by updating its status to "denied".
      Parameters:
      bookingId - the ID of the booking to deny

    • getAllBookings

      public List<Booking> getAllBookings()
      Retrieves all bookings from the database.
      Returns:
      a list of all Booking objects

    • setBookingStatus

      public void setBookingStatus(int approveId, String status)
      Updates the status of a booking.
      Parameters:
      approveId - the ID of the booking to update
      status - the new status to set
